transform_def.name: designed12
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) z = abs(length(p_in / fourpi()) / cos(p_in.x) * tan(length(p_in * pi())) * cos(p_in.x * cos(length(p_in)))) / tan(p_in.y * p_in.x * length(p_in) / halfpi()) con1 = z < r con2 = z > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
